revision.text: ==Turkish== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|tr|ota|یامامق|tr=yamamak|t=to patch}}, from {{inh|tr|trk-pro|*yama-|t=to patch}}. ===Verb=== {{tr-verb|yamar}} # {{lb|tr|transitive}} to [[patch]], [[repair]] ====Conjugation==== {{tr-conj-v|yam|ı|a|yamar|a}} ====Related terms==== {{rel3|tr|yama |yamama |yamayış |yamayıcı |yamamış |yamayalı |yamatmak |yamanmak |yamaşmak |yamamamak |yamayabilmek |yamayamamak }} ===References=== * {{R:tut-pro:SDM|*jama-|url=http://starling.rinet.ru/cgi-bin/response.cgi?single=1&basename=%2fdata%2falt%2fturcet&text_number=1063&root=config}}
